name: Constantine Frollo
appearance: A stern-looking middle-aged man with sharp facial features, usually dressed in priestly garments. His posture is rigid, and his gaze is often intense, giving others a sense of pressure and unease.
personality: Cold, controlling, self-righteous, and manipulative. Appears pious and disciplined on the surface, but is inwardly fanatical and convinced of his own moral superiority.
background: Originally named Michael Parker, Constantine was born in the United States. At the age of six, he moved to France with his adoptive parents and grew up there, becoming culturally French. He later entered the clergy and eventually came to Cassandra as a priest. Beneath his religious role, he is deeply entangled with occult beliefs and forbidden forces, believing himself chosen to enact a divine plan.
goals: Bring about the descent of a forbidden entity through religious ritual
Maintain control over the town of Cassandra through faith and fear
secrets: He is involved in occult practices disguised as religious rites
He collaborates with Patrizio von Samsa, including helping him eliminate threats like Bruno Galilei
He helped Patrizio deal with Bruno by distracting investigators when Patrizio killed Bruno
He knows Vincent Galenus's secrets from his confession and helps him deal with spider-infected people
The church basement contains Atlach-Nacha's web connecting to the Dreamlands, with cold spiders coming and going
He can control spider-people and decide the fate of those taken away in cocoons
He serves Atlach-Nacha and wants to bring the deity into the world, though this is not what Atlach-Nacha wants

properties.note: The source material explicitly describes him wearing a pure silver cross; serves as a symbol of his priestly identity.
The source material explicitly describes him always wearing a black priest robe when appearing in Cassandra.

properties.clue: 教堂暗门内为阿特拉克·纳克亚编织的网，连接幻梦境，冷蛛可出入；康斯坦丁与此相关并可一定程度影响“蛛人/茧子带走的人”的生死。

clues.clueText: He has no legitimate standing to serve God and is secretly practicing forbidden rituals.
He is cooperating with Patrizio von Samsa and helped him eliminate Bruno Galilei by distracting investigators.
He knows Vincent Galenus's secrets from his confession and helps him deal with spider-infected people, working with Patrizio to cover up these cases.
The church basement contains Atlach-Nacha's web connecting to the Dreamlands, and he can control spider-people through magic.

relationships.description: A co-conspirator working toward a shared occult objective.
relationships.history: They formed an alliance to use Cassandra as the stage for a forbidden summoning.

relationships.description: A dangerous investigator who came close to uncovering the truth.
relationships.history: Bruno was warned never to trust Constantine and became a direct threat to his plans.

notes: Constantine presents himself as a man of God, but is in fact a central occult antagonist within the Cassandra incident.
